document_data.name: Circle of Doom
document_data.mainbody: '''''Circle of doom''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created an area of negative energy. The affected area had a radius of {{SI|22|ft}}. Any creature within the area were harmed. This spell had a healing effect on [[undead]] creatures.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
